author: dims
msg: Fix for GERONIMO-2988 - Axis2: needs to support optional wsdl file

author: pamarcelot
msg: Change Character identifier to unicode code for better cross platform handling.

author: schor
msg: UIMA-236 Make docbook create different image sizing widths
for "fo" and "html" so that the html images come out to be
proportionally the same size as the PDF ones, relative to
the text.  (The HTML images were quite bit smaller, and how
much depended on if you used "px" or non-px kinds of measures).
